snippet: Defendants included Kuwaitis, Saudis, Pakistanis, a fugitive of uncertain nationality and “illegal residents.”
abstract: Kuwait announces it will send 29 people to trial in connection with June suicide bombing of Shiite mosque that claimed lives of 27 worshipers.
lead_paragraph: Defendants included Kuwaitis, Saudis, Pakistanis, a fugitive of uncertain nationality and “illegal residents.”

headline.main: Kuwait: 29 to Be Tried in Mosque Attack
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Kuwait: 29 to Be Tried in Mosque Attack
